name: Until Death Do Us Part (M.Y. Hauger)
name_original: Until Death Do Us Part (M.Y. Hauger)
description: This is a short preview sample of a project that I plan to work on in the near future. It's a point and click text adventure where you make choices to determine the outcome of the story. This game has been created in three days, and may or may not have updates in the future.
